CustomField.description: Label updated as a part of SFS-4792
CustomField.formula:
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "CRTD"), 'Created',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "FPI"), 'Forward Planning',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "API"), 'Advanced Planning',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PLND"), 'Planned Work',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "CANC"), 'Cancelled',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "WIP"), 'Works in Progress',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PRRE"), 'Partial Reinst',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "COMP"), 'Work Complete',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "IREI"), 'INTR Reinstated',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PREI"), 'PERM Reinstated',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PHCO"), 'Phase Complete',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "RPA"), 'PAA Requested',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PADP"), 'PAA Deemed Approved',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PAA"), 'PAA Approved',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "RP"), 'Permit Applied For',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PVAR"), 'Permit Variation Applied For',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PDP"), 'Permit Deemed Approved',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PA"), 'Permit Approved',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PRF"), 'Permit Refused',
IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PREV"), 'Permit Revoked (Prpsd Works)', '' ))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Approval Status
